channel.title: Alabama Viking Network on
channel.description: Recent content in Alabama Viking Network on

item.title: Crew, Tribe, MAG. Why be a part of one?
item.description: Why Join a Preparedness Group Humans by nature are Tribal. Security: Strength in numbers. Decision Making & Planning: 2 heads are better than 1, 3 better than 2 and so on.

item.title: Meetup: Cyber Security, Safety, & Privacy
item.description: Just want the meat? Defense easy mode (Getting started) Use Signal to message (and convince others to) instead of SMS, Whatsapp and Telegram.

item.title: What to expect
item.description: Who attends: Anyone into preparedness at any level. If you just added some extra fire extinguishers and water to your home to prepare or if you live on a homestead you’ll find like minded people in the group.

item.title: When do we meet?
item.description: Dates Upcoming February 18th 2023 - All about Area Studies Past (notes for resources) January 21st 2023 - Crew, Tribe, MAG.

item.title: Why do we meet?
item.description: Create and grow relationships with local people to encourage each other in preparing for likely scenarios. Help people connect to start mutual assistance groups.
